articles.content: As for barring Mr. McConnell, the short answer is no. The thing to remember is that Chief Justice Roberts is the presiding officer in the same way that a vice president is, and a vice president cant tell the Senate what a senator should do. The Senate itself … [+2145 chars]

articles.author: Bret Stephens
articles.title: Of Course Bernie Can Win
articles.description: To say Sanders is unelectable is indefensible.
articles.content: So it is, and would be, with Sanders. Depth of conviction? Check. Contempt for conventional norms? Check. Opposed by all the right people? Check. Running against a crooked opponent? Check.Commitment to drastic change? Check. Like Trump, too, he isnt so much c… [+2310 chars]

Ms. Ram, who has lived in South Richmond Hill for nine years, said she would often advise Ms. Fuertes not to leave her house at night. 
She said she had to go for the cats, Ms. Ram said.

articles.title: Taiwan’s Election is a Vote About China
articles.description: The race for president is a proxy contest about national identity.
articles.content: Some of the Chinese governments efforts became mired in red tape, were exposed as veiled indoctrination efforts or were hijacked by people in Taiwan who collaborated only out of opportunism. But also, Beijing itself has unwittingly forged a new brand of patri… [+2240 chars]
